'''Arataki Itto, Present!''' is [[Arataki Itto]]'s [[Level 6 Constellation]].

==Gameplay Notes==
* When an Arataki Kesagiri slash is performed without consuming a Superlative Superstrength stack, the stack indicator will flash red.
